DataElement.preferredDefinition: An indication whether or not a person is employed in healthcare or as a first responder.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Healthcare Activity Or First Responder Employment
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The actions of prevention, treatment, and management of illness and the preservation of mental and physical well-being through the services offered by the medical and allied health professions._An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise._A person with specialized training who is among those responsible for going immediately to the scene of an accident or emergency to provide assistance._The state of being engaged in an activity or service for wages or salary; the occupation for which you are paid.
